record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2074
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2074 -- (House of Representatives - November 08, 2007)

[Page: H13387]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 2074.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from North Carolina?
